Package mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa

SOUSA is a framework for building scalable, open agent applications.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Clock.AlarmHandler A class which represents how to respond to an Alarm
CommandLogic A CommandLogic provides a set of methods that are invokable via RMI.
EntityFSM.State A State is an interface for control aspects of an EntityFSM.
EntityInitializer EntityInitializer defines the parts that an Entity developer must code to initialize an Entity.
Selectable.Handler Each Selectable in a SelectableSet has a Selectable.Handler for a SignalType.
Test.Incrementor This is an example of an interface for a command logic.
 

Class Summary
ByteArray ByteArray is an abstract class which facilitates conversion of Objects to and from byte[].
ClientSideFSM ClientSideFSM contains all information about a single instance of the Entity's role as a client.
ClientSideFSM.FetchRequest FetchRequest is a request by a client Entity to connect to a server Entity.
Clock A class which provides a mechanism to manage a bundle of Alarms and their associated AlarmHandlers in a temporally accurate way.
Clock.Alarm A class which represents a temporal description
ControlLogic Specification the logic of an Entity
Entity An Entity is a sousa clerver (client and server).
EntityFSM EntityFSM is an abstractv class that contains all common information about a single instance of the Entity's as a client or server.
EntityFSM.Request A Request is an abstract base class representing request messages.
EntityFSM.Response A Response is an abstract base class representing response messages.
Executor An Executor is a bundle of CommandLogics, which accepts requests to execute a method based on signature.
Field A single key-value pair within a State
Field.ChangeMessage Message which encapsulates an atomic change to the Field
FieldListener An object which listens to a set of Fields of a State.
Focus The Focus of an Entity contains all information about its roles as a client.
MethodInvocationMessage The carrier of SOUSA's Asynchronous RMI requests
MethodResponseMessage A response message for SOUSA's Asynchronous RMI calls
Nimbus The Nimbus of an Entity contains all information about its roles as a server.
NonBlockingObjectChannel A Selectable object which is backed by an NIO channel.
P2PChannel A P2PChannel is a full-duplex reliable point to point Channel.
P2PChannelFactory A factory for making P2PChannel objects corresponding to incoming connections from clients and outgoing connections to servers.
Projector The Projector contains all information about a single role of the Entity as a server to a set of clients with the same QoS.
QoS Specification of server quality of service to a client.
QoS.ClassComparator A Comparator for QoS objects
Receptor A Receptor is a dynamic cached copy of server data, which is maintained by multicast updates from the server.
RunnableNormInstance RunnableNormInstance is a NormInstance that is also Runnable.
Selectable An object that can originate signals to one or more SelectableSets to which they belong.
SelectableFutureResult The result of an ARMI call, which gets filled in when the result is available.
SelectableNormSession SelectableNormSession is a Selectable NAK-Oriented Reliable Multicast transport.
SelectableSet SelectableSet is a set of Selectable waiting to perform I/O operations together with the means to determine which of them is ready for I/O.
ServerContact An address at which a server can be contacted
ServerSideFSM The ServerSideFSM contains all information about a single role of the Entity as a server (to a single client).
ServerSideFSM.FetchResponse The response to a fetch by a client.
SignalType SignalType -- a signal between Selectables and SelectableSets.
State A collection of Fields in an Entity, and its cached copies at clients.
State.ChangeMessage A Message which encapsulates an atomic change to the State.
Test Testing and examples of two kinds of Entity: client and server.
Test.ClientControlLogic An example of ControlLogic for a client
Test.IntegerIncrementor This is an example of a command logic.
Test.ServerControlLogic An example of ControlLogic for a server
Test.TestViewInterpreter This is an example of a ViewInterpreter.
ViewInterpreter A ViewInterpreter is a Fieldlistener that transforms its Fields of interest into new values in another set of output Fields.
 

Exception Summary
EntityInitializer.InitializationException An implementation of EntityInitializer may throw InitializationException.
 

Package mil.navy.nrl.cmf.sousa Description

SOUSA is a framework for building scalable, open agent applications.
